Spec.title: Level 01-20 (can run RF after fire mastery & 100 Fire Res) {1}
Level 61-80 Swapping Purity of Elements to Purity of Fire + Skitter {4}

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
One of the nice benefits of Chieftain is being able to just Stack Fire Resistance. The only other resist you'll look out for is Chaos Resistance.
^xAF6025What Bandits do I help/Kill^7^xAF6025? ^7Helping Kraityn is what I'll do for 8% Movement Speed Helping Oak is advisible for newer players for 40 Bonus life Killing all Bandits is the best option for Single target since it offers you a skill point ^7 ^xB97123What auras to use in Campaign?^7 In the very early acts we'll be using Vitality, Later in Act 3 We'll gain Access to ^x7070FFPurity of Elements^7 & ^xAF6025Determination^7. Use the Purity of Elements and hold the Determ till once you pickup the Auras Reservation nodes. After securing Freeze Immunity on the Panthon we'll drop Purity of Elements in Favor of Purity of Fire & Skitterbots.
Rare Jewels usually end up being expensive, remember you can look for many different combinations. I'll list some usable stats you can mix and match to save currency ^xB97123Prefix^7 Life, Fire Damage ^xB97123Suffix^7 Increased Damage, Fire damage over time multiplier, damage over time multiplier, area damage, burning damage, chaos resistance, dexterity,
^xB97123Which Large Cluster Jewels^7^xB97123 to use?^7 Anything with Prismatic heart or Burning bright in the front. You can also opt out for 12 Passsive clusters and try to craft them for stats like + Life & Chaos Res with Increased effect.
^xB97123Which Medium Cluster Jewels^7 ^xAF6025to use?^7 Flow of life + Any combination
^xB97123Swapping Determ for Malevolence^7 I would wait until Cloak of Flame & until you complete you block transition. This means using a shaper 5% Recover on block shield with 75% Block & Spell Block. Also make sure you have Disciple of the Unyielding
^xB97123What % Roll do I go for on Adorned?^7 Just roll a 0% adorned and then you don't change anything xdd
